CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 26, 1959, page 24, reads: "Urban League Guild members as their Holly Ball held in the sparkeling new Pittsburgh Hilton Hotel on Dec. 18, beam happily for The Courier photographer as the ball swung into high gear. This is merely some of the active membership and includes Mmes. Mildred Hassis, Alice Parr, President Margaret Burton, Julia Gaines, Elaine Gibson, Catherine Green, Miss Ruth Guyn, Mmes. Mary Alexander and Sydney Taylor Brown. Mrs Green and Mrs. Parr were co-chairmen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Urban Legue members, from left: Mildred Hassis, Alice Parr, President Margaret Burton, Julia Gaines, Elaine Gibson, Catherine Green, Ruth Guyn, Mary Alexander, and Sydney Taylor Brown, gathered in Hilton Hotel, Downtown
